channel.title: Dialogue protocol
channel.description: Would anyone care to explain or tell me how/what I need to declare or whatever to get npc dialogues to work. I'm using the Aero source from Vix. I have mob clicking to work, I just need to implement Dialogues. - The reason for this is because I go to the 317 protocol on the moparisthebest site and it has no explanation of what it would consist of.

item.title: Dialogue protocol
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

DAn0194:

U don’t have to make it lol it’s packet 40.

Oh ha my bad, didn’t notice that that’s there.

-Actually, that’s what I’m wondering. What’s packet 40 consist of I know it says its a fixed. But I don’t necessarily know what that means.
I go and look at hyperion servers and see how they have set it up like but Aero by Vix is different as its setup.

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue protocol

item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Um, where would I exactly get the forward dialogue packet? Is it released or do I make it. If I need to make it, is there a topic around to get to know what it is?

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue protocol
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

You need to create some sort of skeleton for the dialogues (if you want your dialogue system to be maintainable…), which will incorporate the use the forward dialogue packet.

Reply if you need any clarification on anything

Read full topic
